Package services

Class InventoryService

java.lang.Object
services.InventoryService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IInventoryService
public class InventoryService extends Object implements IInventoryService
The InventoryService class provides methods for managing medication inventory, including loading and saving inventory data from/to a CSV file, submitting replenishment requests, updating stock levels, and viewing current inventory.

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryService

      public InventoryService(InventoryDataStore store)
      Constructs an InventoryService instance with the specified InventoryDataStore. Initializes the inventory data by loading it from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      store - the InventoryDataStore to be used by this service

  • Method Details

    • saveDataToCSV

      public void saveDataToCSV()
      Saves the current inventory data to a CSV file. The file will include headers for medicine name, current stock, low level alert, and replenishment status.

    • loadDataFromCSV

      public void loadDataFromCSV()
      Loads inventory data from a CSV file and populates the InventoryDataStore. The CSV file is expected to contain headers followed by rows of inventory data.

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      public void submitReplenishmentRequest()
      Submits a replenishment request for the specified medicine. If the current stock of the medicine is below or equal to the low level alert, the replenishment status is set to PENDING and the data is saved to CSV. the name of the medicine to submit a replenishment request for
      Specified by:
      submitReplenishmentRequest in interface IInventoryService

    • updateStock

      public void updateStock(String medicineName, int quantity, String appointmentID)
      Updates the stock of a specified medicine based on the quantity dispensed for an appointment.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine to update.
      quantity - The quantity of the medicine dispensed.
      appointmentID - The ID of the appointment associated with the dispensed medicine.

    • viewMedicationInventory

      public void viewMedicationInventory()
      Displays the current medication inventory, listing each medicine's name, current stock, low-level alert, and replenishment status. If no medications are in inventory, a message is shown.

    • getInventoryDisplay

      public List<InventoryDisplay> getInventoryDisplay()
      Fetches a list of InventoryDisplay objects representing the current medication inventory. Each InventoryDisplay includes the medicine name, current stock, inventory status, and replenishment status.
      Returns:
      a list of InventoryDisplay objects

    • updateInventory

      Updates an existing inventory item.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      updatedInventory - The updated Inventory object.

      Description copied from interface: IInventoryService

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      quantity - The new stock quantity.

      Specified by:

      Returns:
